body:
Oh, I didn't look at the rest of the file!  As you have it is fine.  I thought I changed all of them to c_foo at one point, but maybe some new ones snuck in!

I'd certainly take the cleanup patch, but it's also easy for me to do it internally.

body_text:
Oh, I didn't look at the rest of the file!  As you have it is fine.  I thought I changed all of them to c_foo at one point, but maybe some new ones snuck in!
I'd certainly take the cleanup patch, but it's also easy for me to do it internally.
